name: Eternal Winter
tooltip:
Eternal Winter

Cost: 3400
+15 Ability Haste
+100 Ability Power
+300 Health
+800 Mana

UNIQUE Passive: Empowers your other Legendary items with 15 ability power.

UNIQUE Active - Glaciate: Deal 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage in a cone, slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (20 second cooldown).
